subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Question,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1242757998
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

try to combine them some how, and see what happens, maybe put some light  
wires  inside the box near where the vibration comes out?  Don't see  how a 
crystal helps, it's just glass, and there is no where for them to create  
ectoplasm like threads on glass, try two tiny wires, (I see u, stop  laughing).
 
 
In a message dated 5/19/2009 2:20:31 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 


There was speaking machines back in the 1800s that had mechanical  vocal 
cords. It still seems easiest for them to manipulate the electrical  signals 
though. 
 
 F-S


On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 10:02 AM, <_SnowfireL@..._ 
(mailto:SnowfireL@...) >  wrote:


 
 


Frank do you think it's similar to what was used in 20's and 30's by  
mediums, where a trumpet (long piece of aluminum metal cone light  weight shaped 
device) was used, it was a form spirit to form their  own vocal cords in mid 
air.  Perhaps, you should set up a test, try  asking something of the 
spirit that you do not know, where it could be  verified later, that way it won't 
have any physical influence.  I  remember voices easily, it's the work I 
do, so I do recognize my mother's  voice, I do think you are all onto some 
thing here, which should one day be  as the air plane, who every thought humans 
would one day fly?  Try some  light weight metal object in the box, maybe 
it would help, maybe shaped  like a pair of vocal cords, with folds see it 
that helps. sf  
 
 
In a message dated 5/19/2009 10:39:32 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
_purplealiengirl@purpleali_ (mailto:purplealiengirl@...)  writes:

 
 


I make the boxes and I don't know, it seems to be a  natural ability that 
most spirits have. Thoughts can interact with the  electronics, and even 
"voices" of the living can come through, in that way  I think we can create what 
we are expecting to hear. 
 

When I first started making this stuff, I gort my wifes "voice"  as she was 
stepping in the shower, upstairs, "I'll be out in two minutes",  in her 
voces, throught he box. It's seems to be more difficult to  conciously form 
voices, kinda like doing PK, it's more of a subconcious  function. Of course 
that was with the radnom sweep, linear sweep seems to  work a little 
differently, and seems to take more ability, or effort.  

The voices seem to made inside the electronics, you can record  with no 
sound output, and still get the same kind of results. Even that  could support 
that suggestion that it's imagination, in that we'd still  hear the same 
stuff in the chopped up audio, not that I believe that.  

Someone needs to study this stuff that hasn't already made up  their minds 
what it is.
 
 Frank-S 


On Mon, May 18, 2009 at 3:27 PM, <_SnowfireL@..._ 
(mailto:SnowfireL@...) > wrote:


 
 


Hi, I have a question for those who use a box instead of radio,  where do 
spirit get the ability to talk with a box?  Are there  certain channels going 
by with the box as is like a radio?  sf
